name: Wage Slave
description:
Welcome to the Moondoe's Team! The Friendly-tainer Super-ista who was supposed to onboard you into our beverage-delivery ecosystem called in sick, but we're sure you will manage to leverage customer satisfaction to achieve revenue targets all on your own!

Oh, and I've synergized some new menu choices to maximize our ROI and reduce churn rates! We are shifting the paradigm of coffee-based beverages to maximize shareholder alignment! You need to ideate to innovate, after all!

Do well, and you'll be one step closer to the staff pizza party!

Best Regards,

The Manager

Instructions

Click and drag ingredients into your cup to add them to the drink. Follow the recipe in the upper-left corner.

Use the steamer, blender, filter, and saw to modify your ingredients - just drop something suitable in, then click to grab the new item.

Submit a drink by placing it on the far left, then clicking the pen. Then, grab a new cup from the stack.

Press Escape to pause and adjust settings.

Playing The Game

The previous error with WebGL has been resolved. It should work in browser or, if you prefer, downloadable versions are available.
